title: Looking for ranked team, bronze/silver

replies.body: Thanks for the offer but i work early and dont play past 12am.

yo, add me in game if you're still interested.

looking at starting up a ranked team consisting of lower ranked players in order to teach them the basics of vision/map/objective control and how to pressure lanes and close games. 

i'm currently p3 but feel i can impart some wisdom and game knowledge onto others.

you would be filling the mid position.

no promises on how high the team will climb, depends on how the players take to advice, have the potential to climb to gold/plat if everyone works at it
